articles.author: Lexi Carson
articles.title: The True Story Behind ‘Baby Reindeer’: Comedian Richard Gadd Escaped His Stalker - Variety
articles.description: Netflix's 'Baby Reindeer' is based on Scottish comedian, actor and writer Richard Gadd's own experience with a stalker and sexual predator in his 20s.
articles.content:
Netflix‘s “Baby Reindeer” is a new miniseries with a twist. 
“Baby Reindeer,” released April 11, is based on Scottish comedian, actor and writer Richard Gadd‘s own experience with a stalker and sexu… [+1988 chars]

articles.author: Matyáš Moravec
articles.title: How logic alone may prove that time doesn't exist - Phys.org
articles.description: Modern physics suggests time may be an illusion. Einstein's theory of relativity, for example, suggests the universe is a static, four-dimensional block that contains all of space and time simultaneously—with no special "now."
